title.rendered: Lindsay Lohan Responds to Jennifer Lawrence Diss, Quotes Maya Angelou For Some Reason

content.rendered:
Reading Time: 2 minutes

As you may have heard, Jennifer Lawrence took a random shot at Lindsay Lohan during an interview with Stephen Colbert last night. 

It was pretty tame as far as LiLo disses go. Basically, J-Law said she throws up a lot (?), but added that it’s not for the reasons that Lindsay Lohan throws up a lot.

It’s the kind of joke people make about Lohan because she drinks a lot and does a lot of drugs.

Anyway, as you might guess, LiLo was not happy, but she showed remarkable restraint on Twitter.

Instead of going off on Jen (We imagine that’ll come later tonight, once Linds starts hitting the bottle.), she had her little sister, Ali "Remember Me?" Lohan do her dirty work.

"I never breathe life into negativity but I stand by my family," Ali tweeted. "Disappointed in Jennifer Lawrence. You lost a fan."

Lawrence, who obviously can’t afford to lose a single fan, is probably devastated.

24 Hottest Jennifer Lawrence Photos

VIEW GALLERY

Lindsay replied to Ali’s tweet, writing, "Thank you sister…Maybe who referring to should learn to support others like #MayaAngelou"

She then posted one of those sunset memes that your mom’s always putting on Facebook with a quote from Angelou’s "Still I Rise."

Something tells us when Maya jotted that one down, she didn’t have entitled cokehead "actresses" in mind, but who knows?

Believe it or not this isn’t the first time that Hollywood’s biggest actress and Hollywood’s human petri dish have clashed.

Last year, Lohan accused Lawrence of having sex for roles, which…we can’t even. 

Is she aware that Lawrence might be the most sought-after talent (male or female) in the industry right now?

Fortunately, Jen wisely steers clear of social media, so hopefully she’s not even aware of this nonsense.

21 Celebrity Feuds We Never Saw Coming

VIEW GALLERY
